name: studio-mcp
description: Make any CLI command an MCP server

scripts.build:pkg: npm run build && npm run fix-imports && pkg ./dist/cli.js --targets node20-linux-x64 --output dist/studio-mcp-linux && pkg ./dist/cli.js --targets node20-macos-x64 --output dist/studio-mcp-macos && pkg ./dist/cli.js --targets node20-win-x64 --output dist/studio-mcp-win.exe
scripts.fix-imports: sed -i.bak 's|@modelcontextprotocol/sdk/server/index.js|@modelcontextprotocol/sdk/dist/cjs/server/index.js|g' dist/studio.js && sed -i.bak 's|@modelcontextprotocol/sdk/server/stdio.js|@modelcontextprotocol/sdk/dist/cjs/server/stdio.js|g' dist/studio.js && sed -i.bak 's|@modelcontextprotocol/sdk/types.js|@modelcontextprotocol/sdk/dist/cjs/types.js|g' dist/studio.js && rm dist/*.bak

author: Martin Emde <me@martinemde.com>
